title: Hringmi hun hi tui luang angin
lyrics:
Hringmi hun hi tui luang angin,
A her liam zel ni tinin;
Hringnun thawhrimna chawlhsanin,
Chatuan innuam kan thleng dawn.

Hringmi hun tui luang ang a liam zel e,
Kir zai rel lovin a her liam zel;
Kan pan mek, chatuan inmawi nuam lam chu,
Hring mi hun tui luang angin a liam zel.

Dam chhung nun kawng chhuk chho zawngleh
Hlim leh lungngaih ni zawngte,
Nuih leh tah hunte hmang zovin,
Thihna luipui kan kai ang.

Nun kawng dika min hruai turin,
Lalpa ring tlat zel ang u;
Kawng bumboh leh raltiah pawh,
Bo lovin min hruai zel ang.

Hringnun lamtluang thui tak zawhin,
Pakhat zelin kan pek dawn;
Kan tlansiakna kan zawh hunin,
Chatuan in nuam kan lut ang.
